name: Mandrills of the Volcanic Axe
description: Hailing from the searing apex of Mt. Kalfus, the Mandrills of the Volcanic Axe are known for their strength, vitality, and good fortune. Now serving as full-time mercenaries (and part-time arsonists), they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
